content: That summer, a beetle suddenly appeared, it clamped down tightly on my finger and wouldn't let go—And that's how I first met Daikabutomaru Mk I.

content: I'd be willing to live in the river if there weren't any fish in there, mm! {A心虚目移}<style=SizeSmall>But for now, I think it's better to stay on the grass...</style>

content: I can't wait to move into the place you've picked for me, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>. It'll be great for running while watching the sunset... {A挠头}<style=SizeSmall>Hmm, actually, it's fine even if there's no sunset.</style>

content: I just learned this about Daikabutomaru... Mmph, is this what they call a dad joke? Anyway, just wanted to share it with you.

content: I like places full of challenges, because, after all, the Kokoro Ichiryu training passed down from generation to generation in the Isaki family is meant to be—{A心虚目移}Mhm, actually, any old place will do.

content: {A思考}If you see something that looks like it's "dribbling a ball," it's not a soccer player. It could be a Daikabutomaru... rolled up into a ball.
